info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 5:24PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Warren and north central Saratoga Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 523 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Warrensburg, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Warrensburg, Lake Luzerne Campground, Lake Luzerne-Hadley, Stony Creek, Thurman Station, Stony Creek Station, Beartown, High Street, Athol, Fourth Lake and Lake Vanare. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
